nodes.text: The Ancient Sith Runestone was an old relic of the Sith uncovered by the Jedi Order during the High Republic Era. Jedi Master Sylwin and Padawan Ady Sun'Zee took the artifact to the Jedi temple on the planet Batuu. There the Sith Runestone corrupted and turned the Jedi against one another with the only survivor of the incident being Sun'Zee.
